title: K. S. S. Nambooripad
summary: K. S. S. Nambooripad (6 April 1935 â€“ 4 January 2020)[1] was an Indian mathematician who has made fundamental contributions to the structure theory of regular semigroups. Nambooripad was also instrumental in popularising the TeX software in India and also in introducing and championing the cause of the free software movement in India.
